body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jeremy Wilson and the customer's name is Angela Evans.  The conversation is about a random business (a Auto Repair Shop ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. My name is John. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, my name is Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble with my laptop. It's very slow and keeps freezing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Sarah. To better assist you, may I have the model number of your laptop?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's AB one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Also, can you confirm the email address associated with your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great. I will look into the issue and see if there are any available solutions for your laptop model. Please give me a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Sarah. I have noted your issue and will take the necessary steps to resolve it. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a great day, Sarah.
